_sText:
dm_3house_v2

Installation:

Extract 'dm_3house_v2.bsp' and 'dm_3house_v2.nav' to your 'Steam\steamapps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps' folder.

Extract the folder 'mytextures' into 'Steam\steamapps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\materials'




This is a simple death match map, constructed of 3 houses, their respectful gardens, and a front road connecting the 3. With numerous ways to travel around
the map, there's always a different route to take, and plenty of secrets to discover. Have fun, and rack up those frags!

Also, this map has some darker areas to contrast with the brighter ones, for a better experience, we suggest allowing flashlights to be used when playing, so that you can light up the darker areas if you wish. It all adds to the fun!
